name: germander
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several plants or small bushes with white, blue, or pink flowers and sometimes silver-grey leaves : Germanders are clipped into large balls in the courtyard garden. Felty germander is native to the Mediterranean region and the Middle East.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is one of only two UK sites for the water germander.Bitters are made from plants of several different classes and might include gentian, germander, hops, and the peel of bitter orange.
